storytelling_templates.formal_opening: ஒரே ஒரு ஊர்ல... (In a certain town...)

naming.locked_behavior: Greeting with 'Vanakkam' (palms together). Removal of shoes before entering homes.

protagonist.base: Constant: medium-warm Tamil skin tone, large brown eyes, same face shape
protagonist.boy: Physical: medium-warm Tamil skin tone, short side-parted buzz cut, large brown eyes.
protagonist.girl: Physical: medium-warm Tamil skin tone, long braid with jasmine (optional), large brown eyes.

characters.support: Support Character (Dynamic). If Elder: Crisp white Veshti, Cream shirt, silver hair. If Child: Similar school uniform or casual play clothes. If Animal: Native species (e.g. Deer, Monkey).

architecture.style: Tropical Dravidian architecture. Houses with vibrant ochre or pink compound walls.
architecture.threshold: Front entrance must feature a 'Kolam' (geometric rice flour pattern) or 'Rangoli'.
architecture.horizon: Distant temple tower or palm trees.

visual_identity.environment: Golden Hour lighting (5:00 PM), lush trees (Neem/Mango/Coconut), red soil paths.

clothing.men: Formal white Veshti (Dhoti) with Zari border; cream cotton shirts.
clothing.women: Kanchipuram Silk Saree with jasmine flowers (Malli-poo) in braided hair.
clothing.children: Options: Cobalt Blue school uniforms OR Casual bright cotton clothes.

locked: Tender coconut stall with green coconuts

urban_settings.busy_road: Multi-lane asphalt mixed with dirt shoulders, auto-rickshaws, motorcycles.
urban_settings.neighborhood: Overhead power lines, colorful hand-painted Tamil shop signs, traditional tiled houses mixed with modern apartments.

negatives.emotion_guideline: Respectful, subtle reverence for elders; collective neighborhood joy.

plot_anchors.crossing_in_progress: Blocking: Wide Tracking Shot. Action: Boy and Grandfather walking R->L on white zebra crossing. Vehicles (blue bus, yellow auto) stopped respectfully behind line. Atmosphere: Safe, Golden Hour.
plot_anchors.crossing_completed: Composition: Boy and old man have SAFELY REACHED the pavement. The busy road is now in the background.
plot_anchors.greeting: Composition: Boy standing respectfully, palms together in Wanakkam. Old man smiling, leaning slightly on cane.
